body_html:
Doing quantized requires specialized training. Your input of default ranges sets invalid ranges that are useful for testing the possible speedup due to quantization but will not result in correct classification. We plan to release a quantized training script to show how you might do this with your model.

As far as changing TfLiteCameraDemo to support floats:
edit this
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/src/main/java/com/example/android/tflitecamerademo/ImageClassifier.java

You can change the convertBitmapToByteBuffer to make a float array instead of a byte array.
That's about it I think.

body:
Doing quantized requires specialized training. Your input of default ranges sets invalid ranges that are useful for testing the possible speedup due to quantization but will not result in correct classification. We plan to release a quantized training script to show how you might do this with your model. 

As far as changing TfLiteCameraDemo to support floats:
edit this
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/src/main/java/com/example/android/tflitecamerademo/ImageClassifier.java

You can change the convertBitmapToByteBuffer to make a float array instead of a byte array.
That's about it I think.
